item.description:
Unfortunately, many Americans have poor eating habits.  Trying to eat healthier isn't easy -- you may feel like you're swimming against the tide.

What's the answer?  Get support!  Spend time with folks committed to making healthier choices!  Find out how they achieved their health goals.  Share your story.    

Join us!  Learn, laugh, and make new friends!

***

7:15 pm: Potluck Dinner begins.

7:30 - 8:30 pm: Talk and Discussion on “How to Achieve Your Health Goals”

8:30 - 9:00 pm:  Chattng and cleaning up.

***

Our speaker, Vera Halina, has been pursuing her passion for healing for the last 12 years.  She has an eclectic background which includes:  Chinese Herbal Medicine, Massage, Reiki, Shamanic Healing, Sacred Hot Stone Therapy, Pure Essential Therapy, Ear Candling, and Organic Facials.  To make alternative healing more accessible, she founded an exciting new company called Vitality Express Referral Alliance.  Also, she blogs and creates radio shows which include interviews with doctors of natural medicine, herbalists and spiritual healers.

Vera will be talking about different forms of support to help you stick with your health goals and achieve them.  Knowledgeable and well-connected, she will answer your health questions and point you to practitioners, centers, and other resources to help you on your healing journey.  And she will share information about SuperBetter, a game, inspired by leading-edge research in psychology, neuroscience and medicine, that can help you achieve any health goal — by increasing your personal resilience.

***

About the potluck dinner:

-Many people have dietary restrictions. Bring a note card that lists the ingredients in the food you bring or fill out a note card at the potluck.

-This a zero-waste event.  Please bring your own plate and utensils.

***

This event is part of a series organized by CT Health Foodies which will usually be on the second Tuesday of the month at ArtSpace in downtown Hartford. CT Health Foodies is a supportive community for people interested in learning more about healthy eating.

***

Free parking in the back of the ArtSpace building.  Ignore "Resident Parking Only" signs.  Parking is allowed during this event.  Enter through the back entrance by the murals.

See you on Tuesday, Feb 21!
item.name: Potluck Dinner and Talk on "How to Achieve Your Health Goals"
